verses.verse: וַיְהִ֤י <S%H1961><s%> became הָעָם֙ <S%H5971><s%> And [when] the people כְּמִתְאֹ֣נְנִ֔ים <S%H596><s%> complained רַ֖ע <S%H7451><s%> of adversity בְּאָזְנֵ֣י <S%H241><s%> the hearing יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD וַיִּשְׁמַ֤ע <S%H8085><s%> heard יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> and the LORD וַיִּ֣חַר <S%H2734><s%> was kindled אַפּ֔וֹ <S%H639><s%> [it] and his anger וַתִּבְעַר־ <S%H1197><s%> burnt בָּם֙ אֵ֣שׁ <S%H784><s%> and the fire יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD וַתֹּ֖אכַל <S%H398><s%> among them and consumed בִּקְצֵ֥ה <S%H7097><s%> [them that were] in the uttermost parts הַֽמַּחֲנֶֽה׃ <S%H4264><s%> of the camp

וַיִּצְעַ֥ק <S%H6817><s%> cried הָעָ֖ם <S%H5971><s%> And the people אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מֹשֶׁ֑ה <S%H4872><s%> unto Moses וַיִּתְפַּלֵּ֤ל <S%H6419><s%> prayed מֹשֶׁה֙ <S%H4872><s%> and when Moses אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD וַתִּשְׁקַ֖ע <S%H8257><s%> was quenched הָאֵֽשׁ׃ <S%H784><s%> the fire

וַיִּקְרָ֛א <S%H7121><s%> And he called שֵֽׁם־ <S%H8034><s%> the name הַמָּק֥וֹם <S%H4725><s%> place הַה֖וּא <S%H1931><s%> of the תַּבְעֵרָ֑ה <S%H8404><s%> Taberah כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> because בָעֲרָ֥ה <S%H1197><s%> burnt בָ֖ם אֵ֥שׁ <S%H784><s%> because the fire יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD

וְהָֽאסַפְסֻף֙ <S%H628><s%> And the mixt multitude אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> who בְּקִרְבּ֔וֹ <S%H7130><s%> that [was] among הִתְאַוּ֖וּ <S%H183><s%> had תַּאֲוָ֑ה <S%H8378><s%> greedy וַיָּשֻׁ֣בוּ <S%H7725><s%> again וַיִּבְכּ֗וּ <S%H1058><s%> also wept גַּ֚ם <S%H1571><s%> and also בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> and the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel וַיֹּ֣אמְר֔וּ <S%H559><s%> and said מִ֥י <S%H4310><s%> Who יַאֲכִלֵ֖נוּ <S%H398><s%> to eat בָּשָֽׂר׃ <S%H1320><s%> Who shall give us flesh

זָכַ֙רְנוּ֙ <S%H2142><s%> We remember אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַדָּגָ֔ה <S%H1710><s%> the fish אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which נֹאכַ֥ל <S%H398><s%> which we did eat בְּמִצְרַ֖יִם <S%H4714><s%> in Egypt חִנָּ֑ם <S%H2600><s%> freely אֵ֣ת <S%H853><s%> הַקִּשֻּׁאִ֗ים <S%H7180><s%> the cucumbers וְאֵת֙ <S%H853><s%> הָֽאֲבַטִּחִ֔ים <S%H20><s%> and the melons וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הֶחָצִ֥יר <S%H2682><s%> and the leeks וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַבְּצָלִ֖ים <S%H1211><s%> and the onions וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַשּׁוּמִֽים׃ <S%H7762><s%> and the garlick

וְעַתָּ֛ה <S%H6258><s%> now נַפְשֵׁ֥נוּ <S%H5315><s%> But now our soul יְבֵשָׁ֖ה <S%H3002><s%> [is] dried away אֵ֣ין <S%H369><s%> There כֹּ֑ל <S%H3605><s%> all בִּלְתִּ֖י <S%H1115><s%> [there is] nothing at all beside אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about הַמָּ֥ן <S%H4478><s%> this manna עֵינֵֽינוּ׃ <S%H5869><s%> [before] our eyes

וְהַמָּ֕ן <S%H4478><s%> And the manna כִּזְרַע־ <S%H2233><s%> seed גַּ֖ד <S%H1407><s%> [was] as coriander ה֑וּא <S%H1931><s%> and its וְעֵינ֖וֹ <S%H5869><s%> and the colour כְּעֵ֥ין <S%H5869><s%> thereof as the colour הַבְּדֹֽלַח׃ <S%H916><s%> of bdellium

שָׁטוּ֩ <S%H7751><s%> went about הָעָ֨ם <S%H5971><s%> [And] the people וְלָֽקְט֜וּ <S%H3950><s%> and gathered וְטָחֲנ֣וּ <S%H2912><s%> [it] and ground בָרֵחַ֗יִם <S%H7347><s%> [it] in mills א֤וֹ <S%H176><s%> or דָכוּ֙ <S%H1743><s%> or beat בַּמְּדֹכָ֔ה <S%H4085><s%> [it] in a mortar וּבִשְּׁלוּ֙ <S%H1310><s%> and baked בַּפָּר֔וּר <S%H6517><s%> [it] in pans וְעָשׂ֥וּ <S%H6213><s%> and made אֹת֖וֹ <S%H853><s%> עֻג֑וֹת <S%H5692><s%> cakes וְהָיָ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> become טַעְמ֔וֹ <S%H2940><s%> of it and the taste כְּטַ֖עַם <S%H2940><s%> of it was as the taste לְשַׁ֥ד <S%H3955><s%> of fresh הַשָּֽׁמֶן׃ <S%H8081><s%> oil

וּבְרֶ֧דֶת <S%H3381><s%> fell הַטַּ֛ל <S%H2919><s%> And when the dew עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on הַֽמַּחֲנֶ֖ה <S%H4264><s%> upon the camp לָ֑יְלָה <S%H3915><s%> in the night יֵרֵ֥ד <S%H3381><s%> fell הַמָּ֖ן <S%H4478><s%> the manna עָלָֽיו׃ <S%H5921><s%> and

וַיִּשְׁמַ֨ע <S%H8085><s%> heard מֹשֶׁ֜ה <S%H4872><s%> Then Moses אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָעָ֗ם <S%H5971><s%> the people בֹּכֶה֙ <S%H1058><s%> weep לְמִשְׁפְּחֹתָ֔יו <S%H4940><s%> throughout their families אִ֖ישׁ <S%H376><s%> every man לְפֶ֣תַח <S%H6607><s%> in the door אָהֳל֑וֹ <S%H168><s%> of his tent וַיִּֽחַר־ <S%H2734><s%> was kindled אַ֤ף <S%H639><s%> and the anger יְהוָה֙ <S%H3069><s%> God מְאֹ֔ד <S%H3966><s%> greatly וּבְעֵינֵ֥י <S%H5869><s%> affliction מֹשֶׁ֖ה <S%H4872><s%> Moses רָֽע׃ <S%H7451><s%> adversity

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said מֹשֶׁ֜ה <S%H4872><s%> And Moses אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD לָמָ֤ה <S%H4100><s%> Why הֲרֵעֹ֙תָ֙ <S%H7489><s%> Wherefore hast thou afflicted לְעַבְדֶּ֔ךָ <S%H5650><s%> bondage וְלָ֛מָּה <S%H4100><s%> Why לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> not מָצָ֥תִי <S%H4672><s%> found חֵ֖ן <S%H2580><s%> favour בְּעֵינֶ֑יךָ <S%H5869><s%> in thy sight לָשׂ֗וּם <S%H7760><s%> that thou layest אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מַשָּׂ֛א <S%H4853><s%> the burden כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> of all הָעָ֥ם <S%H5971><s%> of all this people הַזֶּ֖ה <S%H2088><s%> this עָלָֽי׃ <S%H5921><s%> and

הֶאָנֹכִ֣י <S%H595><s%> have I הָרִ֗יתִי <S%H2029><s%> Have I conceived אֵ֚ת <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הָעָ֣ם <S%H5971><s%> folk הַזֶּ֔ה <S%H2088><s%> this אִם־ <S%H518><s%> lo אָנֹכִ֖י <S%H595><s%> them יְלִדְתִּ֑יהוּ <S%H3205><s%> forth כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for תֹאמַ֨ר <S%H559><s%> them that thou shouldest say אֵלַ֜י <S%H413><s%> to me שָׂאֵ֣הוּ <S%H5375><s%> unto me Carry בְחֵיקֶ֗ךָ <S%H2436><s%> them in thy bosom כַּאֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> which יִשָּׂ֤א <S%H5375><s%> beareth הָאֹמֵן֙ <S%H539><s%> as a nursing father אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַיֹּנֵ֔ק <S%H3243><s%> the sucking child עַ֚ל <S%H5921><s%> unto הָֽאֲדָמָ֔ה <S%H127><s%> unto the land אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which נִשְׁבַּ֖עְתָּ <S%H7650><s%> which thou swarest לַאֲבֹתָֽיו׃ <S%H1><s%> fathers

מֵאַ֤יִן <S%H370><s%> Whence לִי֙ בָּשָׂ֔ר <S%H1320><s%> should I have flesh לָתֵ֖ת <S%H5414><s%> to give לְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> to all הָעָ֣ם <S%H5971><s%> folk הַזֶּ֑ה <S%H2088><s%> this כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for יִבְכּ֤וּ <S%H1058><s%> bewail עָלַי֙ <S%H5921><s%> before לֵאמֹ֔ר <S%H559><s%> unto me saying תְּנָה־ <S%H5414><s%> Give לָּ֥נוּ בָשָׂ֖ר <S%H1320><s%> us flesh וְנֹאכֵֽלָה׃ <S%H398><s%> that we may eat

לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> am not אוּכַ֤ל <S%H3201><s%> I am not able אָנֹכִי֙ <S%H595><s%> I לְבַדִּ֔י <S%H905><s%> alone לָשֵׂ֖את <S%H5375><s%> to bear אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הָעָ֣ם <S%H5971><s%> all this people הַזֶּ֑ה <S%H2088><s%> this כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> because כָבֵ֖ד <S%H3515><s%> because [it is] too heavy מִמֶּֽנִּי׃ <S%H4480><s%> is too

וְאִם־ <S%H518><s%> if כָּ֣כָה ׀ <S%H3602><s%> thus אַתְּ־ <S%H859><s%> you עֹ֣שֶׂה <S%H6213><s%> And if thou deal לִּ֗י הָרְגֵ֤נִי <S%H2026><s%> thus with me kill נָא֙ <S%H4994><s%> please הָרֹ֔ג <S%H2026><s%> me I pray thee out of hand אִם־ <S%H518><s%> if מָצָ֥אתִי <S%H4672><s%> if I have found חֵ֖ן <S%H2580><s%> favour בְּעֵינֶ֑יךָ <S%H5869><s%> in thy sight וְאַל־ <S%H408><s%> not אֶרְאֶ֖ה <S%H7200><s%> and let me not see בְּרָעָתִֽי׃ <S%H7451><s%> my wretchedness פ

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said יְהוָ֜ה <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מֹשֶׁ֗ה <S%H4872><s%> unto Moses אֶסְפָה־ <S%H622><s%> Gather לִּ֞י שִׁבְעִ֣ים <S%H7657><s%> unto me seventy אִישׁ֮ <S%H376><s%> men מִזִּקְנֵ֣י <S%H2205><s%> of the elders יִשְׂרָאֵל֒ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> whom יָדַ֔עְתָּ <S%H3045><s%> whom thou knowest כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> for הֵ֛ם <S%H1992><s%> like זִקְנֵ֥י <S%H2205><s%> to be the elders הָעָ֖ם <S%H5971><s%> of the people וְשֹׁטְרָ֑יו <S%H7860><s%> and officers וְלָקַחְתָּ֤ <S%H3947><s%> over them and bring אֹתָם֙ <S%H853><s%> אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to אֹ֣הֶל <S%H168><s%> them unto the tabernacle מוֹעֵ֔ד <S%H4150><s%> of the congregation וְהִֽתְיַצְּב֥וּ <S%H3320><s%> that they may stand שָׁ֖ם <S%H8033><s%> there עִמָּֽךְ׃ <S%H5973><s%> with

וְיָרַדְתִּ֗י <S%H3381><s%> And I will come down וְדִבַּרְתִּ֣י <S%H1696><s%> and talk עִמְּךָ֮ <S%H5973><s%> you שָׁם֒ <S%H8033><s%> there וְאָצַלְתִּ֗י <S%H680><s%> with thee there and I will take מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> at הָר֛וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> of the spirit אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> who עָלֶ֖יךָ <S%H5921><s%> and וְשַׂמְתִּ֣י <S%H7760><s%> which [is] upon thee and will put עֲלֵיהֶ֑ם <S%H5921><s%> and they וְנָשְׂא֤וּ <S%H5375><s%> [it] upon them and they shall bear אִתְּךָ֙ <S%H854><s%> for בְּמַשָּׂ֣א <S%H4853><s%> the burden הָעָ֔ם <S%H5971><s%> of the people וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> you will not תִשָּׂ֥א <S%H5375><s%> with thee that thou bear אַתָּ֖ה <S%H859><s%> all לְבַדֶּֽךָ׃ <S%H905><s%> alone

וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הָעָ֨ם <S%H5971><s%> thou unto the people תֹּאמַ֜ר <S%H559><s%> And say הִתְקַדְּשׁ֣וּ <S%H6942><s%> Sanctify לְמָחָר֮ <S%H4279><s%> yourselves against to morrow וַאֲכַלְתֶּ֣ם <S%H398><s%> and ye shall eat בָּשָׂר֒ <S%H1320><s%> flesh כִּ֡י <S%H3588><s%> for בְּכִיתֶם֩ <S%H1058><s%> for ye have wept בְּאָזְנֵ֨י <S%H241><s%> in the ears יְהוָ֜ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD לֵאמֹ֗ר <S%H559><s%> saying מִ֤י <S%H4310><s%> Oh יַאֲכִלֵ֙נוּ֙ <S%H398><s%> to eat בָּשָׂ֔ר <S%H1320><s%> Who shall give us flesh כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> for ט֥וֹב <S%H2895><s%> ? for [it was] well לָ֖נוּ בְּמִצְרָ֑יִם <S%H4714><s%> with us in Egypt וְנָתַ֨ן <S%H5414><s%> will give יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> therefore the LORD לָכֶ֛ם בָּשָׂ֖ר <S%H1320><s%> you flesh וַאֲכַלְתֶּֽם׃ <S%H398><s%> and ye shall eat

לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> nor י֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> day אֶחָ֛ד <S%H259><s%> one תֹּאכְל֖וּן <S%H398><s%> Ye shall not eat וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> nor יוֹמָ֑יִם <S%H3117><s%> nor two days וְלֹ֣א ׀ <S%H3808><s%> nor חֲמִשָּׁ֣ה <S%H2568><s%> nor five יָמִ֗ים <S%H3117><s%> days וְלֹא֙ <S%H3808><s%> nor עֲשָׂרָ֣ה <S%H6235><s%> neither ten יָמִ֔ים <S%H3117><s%> days וְלֹ֖א <S%H3808><s%> nor עֶשְׂרִ֥ים <S%H6242><s%> nor twenty יֽוֹם׃ <S%H3117><s%> days

עַ֣ד ׀ <S%H5704><s%> against חֹ֣דֶשׁ <S%H2320><s%> month יָמִ֗ים <S%H3117><s%> A whole עַ֤ד <S%H5704><s%> against אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> who יֵצֵא֙ <S%H3318><s%> until it come out מֵֽאַפְּכֶ֔ם <S%H639><s%> at your nostrils וְהָיָ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> and becomes לָכֶ֖ם לְזָרָ֑א <S%H2214><s%> and it be loathsome יַ֗עַן <S%H3282><s%> unto you because כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for מְאַסְתֶּ֤ם <S%H3988><s%> that ye have despised אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> who בְּקִרְבְּכֶ֔ם <S%H7130><s%> which [is] among וַתִּבְכּ֤וּ <S%H1058><s%> you and have wept לְפָנָיו֙ <S%H6440><s%> before לֵאמֹ֔ר <S%H559><s%> him saying לָ֥מָּה <S%H4100><s%> Why זֶּ֖ה <S%H2088><s%> ever יָצָ֥אנוּ <S%H3318><s%> Why came we forth מִמִּצְרָֽיִם׃ <S%H4714><s%> Egypt
